DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional treatment Registry Hereditary Angioedema ( HAE ) patient treat C1 inhibitor , either plasma-derived ( pdC1INH ) recombinant human form ( Ruconest ) , observe adverse event insufficient efficacy , assess immunological profile follow single repeat treatment Ruconest .
